Module brandon.secondscreen
Package Model

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
Model.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
Inventory class to manage the product and part inventory.

      part - The new part to replace the existing one.

    • validatePartDelete

      public static boolean validatePartDelete(Part part)
      Validates if a part can be deleted based on its associations.
      Parameters:
      part - The part to be validated.
      Returns:
      True if part is found in any product, otherwise false.

    • validateProductDelete

      public static boolean validateProductDelete(Product product)
      Validates if a product can be deleted based on its associations.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to be validated.
      Returns:
      True if product has associated parts, otherwise false.

    • lookupPart

      public static int lookupPart(String searchTerm)
      Searches for a part by its ID or name.
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - The term used for searching.
      Returns:
      The index of the part if found, otherwise -1.
